name: Dragon Princes - Fiumenze: Street Rat
description:
Episode one of a continuing story about a street rat in the city of Fiumenze. Can you find your way out of the dragon prince's prison?

Set in the D&D campaign world Tirenia http://tirenia.blogspot.com/

Thank you to Adam Le Doux for making Bitsy,  ayolland for Borksy, and all the lovely people who write tutorials and other hacks on here and Discord.
